txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Clean tails from the worms surrounding the dwarf-home of Zigilgund. Deliver the items to Forti, overseer of the settlement.
'It will take a while to cure these, so we had better get to the process. Thank you.'
'In a pinch, a well-treated worm-tail can be shredded and used as lashings. Always best to be prepared.'
Forti, overseer of the dwarves of Forochel, awaits the delivery of clean tails at the dwarf-home of Zigilgund.
Deliver the clean tails to Fotri at Zigilgund in Forochel
You have accepted a task to collect and deliver clean tails from the worms surrounding Zigilgund in Forochel. The items are to be delivered to the dwarf-overseer Fotri encamped at the dwarf-home.
Wanted: Clean tails from the worms surrounding the dwarf-home of Zigilgund.
